div.div: Congratulations to Mr. Pukys on being the November Superintendent Teacher of the Month! FISD-Education Foundation awarded Mr. Pukys with $250 for his classroom!

img.alt: UPDATE: UIL - no athletic contests or practices allowed through May 4th

div.h3: UPDATE: UIL - no athletic contests or practices allowed through May 4th
div.div: The UIL has mandated that at this time there will be no athletic contests until after May 4th. Practices and open gym/field/weight room are also suspended at this time. This is a fluid situation . . .
